author: PTI
title: Coronavirus survivor from Gujarat says staying at home is the only option
description: The woman, a resident of Ambawadi locality in Ahmedabad, was discharged from Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel Hospital in Ahmedabad on March 29 after she recovered from the coronavirus disease COVID-19
content:
A 34-year-old woman, who has recovered from COVID-19, now regrets her decision to travel abroad which resulted in her contracting the infection, and has urged people to remain indoors to check the spread of the deadly virus.
